name: Heliotropism
description:
Ever wondered 'what if I was a tree'? Seek no further, Heliotropism is here.

In this turn-based game, you will have to manage your resources to survive and thrive as a magnificent plant, enduring seasons to grow your fruits and pave the road for your next generations.

The chore of being a tree is not easy, as you will have to change yourself to unpredictable crises and harsh winters. But you will have a wonderful voice in your head to tell you what's going on.
